mapper.insert: insert into uo_qywx_msg_template(text_content, insert_by, product_url, product_name, coupon_url, coupon_name) values (#{textContent}, #{insertBy}, #{productUrl}, #{productName}, #{couponUrl}, #{couponName})
mapper.select: select qywx_id, text_content, insert_dt, insert_by, update_dt, update_by, product_url, product_name, coupon_url, coupon_name, (date_part('day', now() - cast(insert_dt as TIMESTAMP)) + 1) used_days, (select count(1) from uo_op_daily_template_config where uo_op_daily_template_config.qywx_id = uo_qywx_msg_template.qywx_id) used_groups from uo_qywx_msg_template order by insert_dt desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: update uo_qywx_msg_template set (text_content, product_url, product_name, coupon_url, coupon_name) = (#{textContent}, #{productUrl}, #{productName}, #{couponUrl}, #{couponName}) where qywx_id = #{qywxId}
update uo_op_daily_template_config set qywx_id = null, qywx_op_flag='Y', qywx_op_dt=now() where qywx_id = #{id}::integer
